dmca.title: Unauthorized Use of Warner Bros.' Property
dmca.body:
Dear Digg,

 
Digg.com is offering 1 image from THE DARK KNIGHT, consisting of the Two
Face character.  I have a good faith belief that such content is not
authorized by Warner Bros., its agent, or the law and therefore
infringes Warner Bros.' rights.   

 
Image to be removed is located at:

http://digg.com/movies/Leaked_Two_Face_production_art_from_Dark_Knight

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.
 

Please confirm that you have taken the appropriate action at your
earliest convenience.  Thank you for your prompt attention to this
matter and please advise should you have any questions or require any
additional information. 


Thank you,

 

/[private]

 
[private]
Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc.
[private]
Burbank, California 91522
Phone: [private]
Fax:  [private]
[private]@warnerbros.com
